channel.title: open-source on clayto
channel.description: Recent content in open-source on clayto

item.title: Open Jam Workshop
item.description: The East Coast Game Conference was a lot of fun! Jared and I gave a 6-hour hands-on workshop where led the audience through building a game with entirely open-source gamedev tools. Abstract Join us for a workshop on game jams and open-source game development tools. Open-source tools have been lovingly crafted that cover every medium of game development. Through a series of hands-on labs, we will introduce you to many of those tools, with a focus on using them for game jams.

item.title: Open Jam
item.description: Open Jam is an open-source themed game jam run by Jared and myself, with a lot of help from opensource.com. Check it out at openjam.io. Open Jam 2018 Open Jam 2017
